Understate: The claim may understate the impact of the proposed budget on reducing the deficit by only mentioning a $400 billion reduction over the next decade, rather than providing a comprehensive analysis of the potential impact.
Lack enough support: The claim may lack enough support to fully substantiate the assertion that the proposed budget will reduce the deficit to the lowest level since Dwight Eisenhower was president.
